title: Ep 93: Amazon's Comfiest Underwear with Emily Farris
itunes:title: Ep 93: Amazon's Comfiest Underwear with Emily Farris
itunes:subtitle: Writer and creator Emily Farris joins us to spill the beans about her fav Amazon underwear, her late-in-life ADHD diagnosis, and her new podcast, “Mother, Mother” which launches in October with ACast. We also discuss one of the worst New York Times art...
description:
Writer and creator Emily Farris joins us to spill the beans about her fav Amazon underwear, her late-in-life ADHD diagnosis, and her new podcast, “Mother, Mother” which launches in October with ACast. We also discuss one of the worst New York Times articles ever from 2017 and my new obsession with Parade underwear thanks to so many of you guys in the Facebook group!


Mentioned on the show:

  • The Amazon Underwear: https://amzn.to/3u7YYFZ 
  • Parade Underwear (Currently 20% off 5 pairs!): https://fave.co/2XUz0da 
  • Mother, Mother: https://mothermotherpodcast.com/
  • ~WhEn MoMmY hAs tO mArCH~ https://www.nytimes.com/2017/01/22/nyregion/womens-march-montclair-nj.html


Gee Thanks! is powered by subscribers like you! To keep all of our Gee Thanks! content free and accessible to all, consider making a monthly donation of $2 to keep us going. For a limited time, $2 supporters get access to an episode of JUST ONE EPISODE, our Patreon podcast with Jackie Johnson of Natch Beaut.


Follow along with recs (and share your own via DM) on the “Gee Thanks, Just Bought It!” Instagram: www.instagram.com/geethanksjustboughtitpod and shop all of our recs here: https://shoplist.us/geethanksjustboughtit and here: https://www.amazon.com/shop/geethanksjustboughtit 


Subscribe to Flavor of the Week, a weekly newsletter featuring one product we love, why we love it, and where you can get it. It’s free! https://geethanks.substack.com/p/hello-flavor-of-the-week 


As always, reach me at Caroline@geethanksjustboughtit.com, @geethanksjustboughtitpod on Instagram, or leave me a message at 424-245-0736. 


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
